name: raspberry-pi-mirror
description: create a smart mirror using Raspberry Pi 4, monitored with a full stack app.

scripts.dev: concurrently "nodemon server.js" "cd client && npm run start"
scripts.electron-dev: concurrently "nodemon server.js" "cd client && npm run electron-dev"
scripts.electron-pi: concurrently "node server.js" "cd client && npm run electron-dev"
scripts.pi: concurrently "node server.js" "cd client && npm run start"
scripts.heroku-postbuild: cd client && npm install && npm run build

author: Tracy Nguyen
